de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database

Class DbHistoryActivityInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database.DbObject
      • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database.DbHistoryActivityInstance

  • public class DbHistoryActivityInstance
extends DbObject
    This class provides the actual implementation for the logging of ActivityInstances and the retrieval of log entries for presentation.

    • Method Detail

      • createEntry

        public int createEntry(int id,
              java.lang.String state)
        This method saves a log entry containing an activity state transition into the database.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the ActivityInstance that is changed.
        state - the new state of the ActivityInstance.
        Returns:
        the generated key for the insert statement.

      • createNewActivityEntry

        public int createNewActivityEntry(int id)
        This method saves a log entry of a newly created ActivityInstance into the database.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the ActivityInstance that is created.
        Returns:
        the generated key for the insert statement.

      • getLogEntriesForScenarioInstance

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> getLogEntriesForScenarioInstance(int scenarioInstanceId)
        This method returns the Activity log entries for a ScenarioInstance.
        Parameters:
        scenarioInstanceId - ID of the ScenarioInstance for which the activity log entries shall be returned.
        Returns:
        a Map with a Map of the log entries' attribute names as keys and their respective values.
